# tg_user (Resource)

Manage a Trustgrid user



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) User email address

### Optional

- `idp` (String) Identity provider ID
- `policy_ids` (List of String) List of policy IDs assigned to the user
- `status` (String) User status (active or inactive)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `uid` (String) User unique identifier (UUID)
